Name: Envy
Review Text: Truly an incredible experience. The food and flavor mixes were spectacular! I wished I had done the wine pairing, so I did it the second time!

Name: Envy
Review Text: Inconspicuous place; it looks closed from the outside, so you may miss it completely! Sleek decor and the food is fine-dining. Name: Envy
Review Text: A treat for all your senses! Enjoy the many small dishes by going for a 4 or 6 course menu. You will be wowed by all the wonderfull tasts the chefs put together for you. Just Go with The Flow and enjoy. The portions are set to really enjoy your Food. So No 6 once steaks are all you can eat Stuff here, and thats a delight!!

Name: Envy
Review Text: The best Restaurant in the world.. the dishes are small and the concept is to try out more than usualy.. the food is not from this world.. its so good and made with Love.. i really love it and cant get enough.. one reason to travel to amazerdam for me is this restaurant.. love love love it..

Name: Envy
Review Text: Great atmosphere and very friendly staff. The wine pairing menu was superb and the combinations with the food was delicious. Excellent place for a romantic night out but also perfect for a little more casual dining!

Name: Envy
Review Text: Great dishes, but very slow in the beginning: first course took 40min, 2nd took 30 min more. Once we mentioned that, they sped up though. Very kind and professional staff!

Review Text: Wonderful chefs table dinner for €70. Extremely happy with the food and service.

Review Text: This place is ridiculous. All the chefs are magicians. Speechless by the end of the meal. Best meal I’ve ever eaten.

Review Text: Very stylish restaurant. Amazing food (Envy Menu). Great service.

Review Text: We had the six servings with wine paring. The food and wine was awesome. The service was excellent and friendly. Highly recommend for couples or small parties trust the chef for the entrees. Sophisticated atmosphere. Not for picky eaters or children.

Name: Envy
Review Text: We had a surprise dinner at the big table right in front of the kitchen. The food was very good - exciting and very delicious. It was good to give a feedback to the chefs after each course. Thank you very much, we had a great evening.

Name: Envy
Review Text: Absolutely amazing. Menu is so unique. We went for the tasting menu which is the Chef's surprise. With the wine tasting. It was Michelin star 100%. The staff were so friendly and attentive. Modern decor, on a quiet street. Would definitely return.

Name: Envy
Review Text: Excellent higher class restaurant to try out. Nice variations of food. Especially with the beetroot, white choclat amuse. Service was excellent and great help with the wines. Think the ambiance is a bit less because the restaurant is long but they can't help it though.

Name: Envy
Review Text: Great place for small tapas-like modern cuisine.  The dishes are well-conceptualized, and the presentation is very good.  This is not a place to eat to be full (although you could), but more of a place where you enjoy creative food.  Drinks and wine selection is good, too.
